lead_paragraph: Mr. Higgins helped lift a billiards-like sport with his charisma and intense style, but his appetites for excess brought him turmoil.
snippet: Mr. Higgins helped lift a billiards-like sport with his charisma and intense style, but his appetites for excess brought him turmoil.

headline.main: Alex Higgins, the Bombastic ‘People’s Champion’ of Pro Snooker, Dies at 61
headline.seo: Alex Higgins, Bombastic Snooker Champ, Dies at 61
headline.print_headline: Alex Higgins, 61, the Bombastic ‘People’s Champion’ of Pro Snooker
